alert.note: Alert for Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 8:23AM CDT until March 30 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LOGAN...EAST CENTRAL SCOTT...SOUTHWESTERN YELL AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 823 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stonehouse Recreation Area to near Mimosa, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Norman... Oden... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mimosa... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Mount Magazine... Mauldin... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Havana... Black Springs... Wing... Fannie... Bluffton... Rover... Fancyhill... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for western and central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
